html:
Former England manager Gareth Southgate has been tipped to succeed Erik ten Hag in the Manchester United dugout, should the club decide to part ways with the Dutchman.

However, it seems the 54-year-old won‚Äôt be coaching any team for a while.

Gareth Southgate rules out coaching in the next year putting him out the mix if a #MUFC vacancy materialises any time soon.
